reporter_caption.center: PREJEAN v. TRAVELERS INSURANCE COMPANY, 256 La. 760 (1970)

caption.center: ROBERT PREJEAN v. THE TRAVELERS INSURANCE COMPANY.

opinion.posture: IN RE: ROBERT PREJEAN APPLYING FOR CERTIORARI, OR WRIT OF REVIEW, TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, THIRD CIRCUIT, PARISH OF ST. MARTIN.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Writ refused. On the facts found by the Court of Appeal, there is no error of law.
